page.title: 12PARENT'S JOBS (3)
page.content:
Surveyor 1 Taxi Driver 4 Teacher 10 Telephone Unemployed 11 Engineer 1 Usherette 1 V.A.T. Inspect. 1 Vicar 1 Warehouse Water Board 1 Manager 2 Welder 3 Wine Sales 1 Xmas Crackers 1
A group of children from our class (6B) decided to conduct a survey of parents' jobs. We collected information about 432 parents from the junior children at New Brighton Primary during the Summer term 1985. We hope to show the types of jobs that are done in our area.
JOB SURVEY COLLATED BY: Howard Hggerty (age 10) Philip Ditchfield (age 10).
